text: Danial Jafari (; 17 November 2010 in Kerman) is an Iranian actor. Jafari received a special award and certificate of appreciation for his performance in the film Baghe Kianoush at the 42nd Fajr International Film Festival. == Career == He has received two international acting certificates from the University of Oxford in the United Kingdom. ==References== * Category:Iranian actors Category:2010 births Category:Living people
title: Danial Jafari
